dict.string: Shake vigorously and serve.
1/2 oz white creme de menthe 3/4 oz Southern ComfortÆ peach liqueur 1/2 oz StolichnayaÆ vodka fill with hot chocolate
After Dinner Mint
Pour the ingredients into a glass and stir.
scotch whisky, coconut rum, cherry brandy, lemonade
Aftershock
Pour all ingredients into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass.
1 part AbsolutÆ vodka 1 part DeKuyperÆ Sour Apple Pucker schnapps 1 part apple juice
Apple Martini
Pour the liqueur into a glass, add the cider, and serve cold.
2 oz apple whiskey 1/4 baked apple 1 tsp honey hot water cinnamon stick for garnish
Baked Apple
Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
1/2 oz blackberry brandy 1/2 oz white creme de menth
Bee Stinger
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker over ice. Close the shaker and shake briskly two or three times. Strain into a large martini glass, and serve.
3 oz gin 2 oz sweet vermouth 1 oz sweet and sour mix 1 oz SpriteÆ soda 2 oz cranberry juice
Beetle Juice
Combine chilled ingredients in a punch bowl. Serve over crushed ice in tall glasses or punch glasses. Garnish with a slice of lime and/or a maraschino cherry.
1 oz vodka 2 oz orange juice 1 oz white rum 1 oz triple sec 1/2 lime juice 1 oz pineapple juice 1 slice of orange
Black Eyed Susan
Combine both while cold.
2 oz vodka 5 oz grapefruit juice
Blue Dog

Pour the vodka, rum, lime juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass 1/3 filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, add creme de bananes on top, stir once and serve.
1 oz AbsolutÆ vodka 1 oz white rum 1/2 oz creme de bananes orange juice lime juice ginger ale
Bookmaker's Luck
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.
1/2 oz gin 1 oz triple sec 1 tsp lemon juice 1/2 tsp grenadine syrup 1 egg white
Boxcar
Combine ingredients in a coffee mug. Top with whipped cream and coconut shavings.
1/2 oz coconut rum 1/2 oz FrangelicoÆ hazelnut liqueur 1/2 oz Bailey'sÆ Irish cream 4 - 6 oz coffee 1 pinchshredded coconuts
Cafe Joy
Pour rum and Cola into a highball glass on the rocks. Mix until the cola fizzes at the top, and serve.
1 oz Captain MorganÆ Original spiced rum 1/2 oz armagnac 1 tsp lemon juice 1 bottlechilled cola
Captain and Cola
Mix in a blender and pour into a small snifter.
1 oz whiskey 1 scoop vanilla ice cream
Cat's Meow
Shake ingredients and strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish a slice of orange and a cherry.
1 oz HeeringÆ cherry liqueur 1 oz DeKuyperÆ Peachtree schnapps 4 ozfresh orange juice
Cupid's Cocktail
Shake rum, amaretto, and orange juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass over ice. Add grenadine and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a strawberry
1 oz coconut rum 1/2 oz amaretto almond liqueur 4 oz orange juice 1/2 oz grenadine syrup
Day at the Beach
Add ice to a collins glass. Pour herbal liqueur and vodka over the ice. Add root beer to fill glass/to taste, and add a squeeze of a lemon-quarter.
2 ozchilled Jagermeister herbal liqueur 1 oz vodka 1 squeeze lemons 3 - 5 ozchilled root beer
Deer Hunter
Pour ingredients into a Rocks Glass filled with ice.
2 oz Myer's dark rum 1/2 oz sloe gin fill with orange juice 1/2 oztop with Bacardi 151 rum
Firecracker
Simply pour the ingredients into a double shot shot glass and serve.
1 oz BacardiÆ 151 rum 1/2 oz Boo KooÆ energy drink 1/2 oz orange juice
Flaming Nerd
Layer in sequence in a shot glass.
1 part KahluaÆ coffee liqueur 1 part Bailey'sÆ Irish cream 1 part Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps
Gingerbread Man
Mix vodka and sweet and sour mix proportionally in any size batch, then add sprite or 7-up and cranberry accordingly, a dash each per serving.
2 shots vodka 2 shots sweet and sour mix 1 dash SpriteÆ soda 1 dash cranberry juice
Key West Lemonade

Add sugar to the rim of an old-fashioned glass, and drop a cube or packet of sugar into the bottom of the glass. Pour vodka and lemon juice into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Pour into the prepared old-fashioned glass, and serve.
1/2 oz vodka 1/2 oz lemon juice 1 sugar cube
Lemon Drop
Shake vodka and irish cream over ice then pour into a shooter.
3/4 oz SmirnoffÆ Blue Label vodka 3/4 oz Bailey's Irish cream
Letter Bomb
Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into the glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top. Garnish with lemon.

0.25 oz Tanqueray gin 0.25 oz Smirnoff vodka No.21 0.25 oz Captain MorganÆ Silver spiced rum 0.25 oz Jose Cuervo Especial gold tequila 0.25 oz triple sec 1 oz sweet and sour mix 6 oz cola 1 wedge lemon (optional)
Long Island Ice Tea
Roll rim of glass in additional orange drink. Shake ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain and serve in cocktail glasses.
4 oz orange vodka 1 oz triple sec 1 oz Tang powdered soft drink
Lost in Space
Add bourbon wiskey and sweet vermouth. Mix and serve in martini glass.
1 oz Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch whisky 0.5 oz sweet vermouth
Manhattan
Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

1 1/2 oz melon liqueur 1 oz white rum 1 oz Southern ComfortÆ peach liqueur 1/2 oz lime juice 1 oz lemonade
1 1/2 oz melon liqueur 1 oz white rum 1 oz Southern ComfortÆ peach liqueur 1/2 oz lime juice 1 oz lemonade
1 1/2 oz melon liqueur 1 oz white rum 1 oz Southern ComfortÆ peach liqueur 1/2 oz lime juice 1 oz lemonade
1 1/2 oz melon liqueur 1 oz white rum 1 oz Southern ComfortÆ peach liqueur 1/2 oz lime juice 1 oz lemonade
1 1/2 oz melon liqueur 1 oz white rum 1 oz Southern ComfortÆ peach liqueur 1/2 oz lime juice 1 oz lemonade
Melon Tree
Pour a shot of tequila and amaretto in seperate shot glasses. Place a very thin layer of 151 on top of both shots. Shoot the tequila first, then carefully drop the amaretto into a mug of beer. Chug.
1 1/4 oz tequila 1 1/4 oz amaretto almond liqueur 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 rum 3 oz beer
Mexican Bomb
Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum w/ ice. Set aside. While frozen, add pina colada mix to a cocktail glass. Add the daiquiri mix on top, keeping it seperated from the pina colada mix. Serve.
1.25 oz Captain MorganÆ Original spiced rum 12 mint leaves 1 tbsp sugar 0.5 oz lime juice 2 oz soda
Miami vice
Place mint leaves in bottom of glass. Add crushed ice, Spiced Rum, sugar, and lime juice, and muddle. Add soda water and garnish with mint leaves.
1.25 oz BacardiÆ white rum 3/4 oz triple sec 1 oz cranberry juice 1 oz pineapple juice 1 oz orange juice
Mojito

Use a standard white wine glass half filled with ice before making. Pour the alcohol in with rum first then the triple sec. Use just a splash of pineapple juice and orange juice first. then add the cranberry juice; garnish with a cherry.
1.25 oz BacardiÆ white rum 3/4 oz triple sec 1 oz cranberry juice 1 oz pineapple juice 1 oz orange juice
Music City Sunset
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, chill and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.
strawberry liqueur, orange liqueur, raspberry liqueur, lime juice
Neapolitan
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with one cup of crushed ice. Strain into a margarita glass and serve immediately.
1/2 oz Bourbon 1 oz Firewater 1/2 oz Mountain Dew
Neon Geek
Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
1 oz gin 1 tbsp lemon juice 1 tbsp orange juice
Polo Cocktail
Mix ingredients until chilled in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with cherries, and serve.
1 oz BolsÆ Blue Curacao liqueur 1 oz DeKuyperÆ Peachtree schnapps 1 oz BacardiÆ light rum 1 oz Ketel OneÆ vodka 1 oz Rose'sÆ grenadine syrup 3 oz SpriteÆ soda
Purple Yummy
Heat and pour into an irish coffee cup. Top with whipped cream, garnish with a tall cinnamon stick, and serve.
1/2 oz Orange Curacao liqueur 1/2 oz cinnamon schnapps 3/4 oz vodka 6 oz cranberry juice
Red Rudolph
Add Spiced Rum, blackberry liqueur, crème de banana liqueur, orange juice, grenadine, and crushed ice in a blender. Blend until slushy and pour into glass.
0.75 oz Captain MorganÆ Original spiced rum 0.25 oz blackberry liqueur 0.25 oz creme de bananes 2 oz orange juice 8 ozcrushed ice
Rum Runner
Fill shaker with ice, add ingredients, chill, strain.
5 cl AbsolutÆ vodka 5 cl Bailey'sÆ Irish cream 5 cl KahluaÆ coffee liqueur 5 cl FrangelicoÆ hazelnut liqueur 10 cl milk
Sandbar Sleeper
Add ingredients with a bit of ice in a blender. Blend and then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish w/ strawberry.
1/2 oz strawberry schnapps 1 oz light rum 1 oz lime juice 1 tsp powdered sugar 1 oz strawberries
Strawberry Daiquiri
151 first, then peppermint liqueur.
1/2 oz BacardiÆ 151 rum 1/2 oz Rumple MinzeÆ peppermint liqueur
Terminator
Shake together over ice, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry.
lemon vodka, pepper vodka, kurant vodka, vodka, orange juice
Vodka Mixer
